casebody.data:
Kenneth M. SCHWERING, Individually and as Personal Representative of the Estate on Behalf of Beverly D. Schwering, petitioner,
v.
TRW VEHICLE SAFETY SYSTEMS INC., et al. No. 12-1297. Supreme Court of the United States June 10, 2013.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.
